website_summaries.verdict: A hunting slingshot that delivers precise shooting at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Includes adjustable wrist brace for use by people of all ages
All-metal slingshot with durable rubber bands constructed to last
Handle grip molded to fit perfectly in hand
Strong enough to hunt rabbits, birds, or other medium-size prey
cons: Wrist bracket doesn't lie flat against forearm

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality Solid Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot is well constructed. It’s solid without being heavy. One thing to note is that the pulling power requires a bit of strength. This is a professional type of slingshot and I would not consider giving this to a kid (or someone immature). I would not hesitate to buy from the seller again. The seller was very responsive and quickly sent a replacement for the broken tubing and then some.
customer_reviews.author: J. C

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed with the product. I opened the box and found a broken rubber band. It's a shame you can't buy anything with quality control anymore. The rest of the product appears too be ok.(UPDATE) Extremely satisfied with customer service and fast resolve of my problem. I wouldn't hesitate too purchase from them in the future. A very satisfied and Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C Riker

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I use it to scare off pigeons
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it to scare off pigeons. Does a great job. Turned it sideways and used the site, was accurate enough out to about 20 yards the 1st day. The kit I got came with two bands, although the picture shows three. I asked seller Nobodo about it, he immediately sent me out two pair of the "three band" bands. Careful what you ask for. The three bands are A LOT harder to draw back. **Side note, I use airsoft, biodegradable pellets. They work great one or two at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Jed W

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and loose
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this once. The bottom was all wobbly and the metal part just flapped around. I returned it and they didn't refund me all my money. Won't do business here again.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Jovi

customer_reviews.title: It works, band breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: The fancy green slingshot shipped out and arrived on time. Packaged well. The sling shot was not put together very well. The nut was not on the wrist support when I opened it. The top was very loose. I put the not on the wrist support and tightened the top allen bolt It shoots okay but not nearly the power of the older slingshot we have. After about 30 shots one of the bands broke and we had to replace it with the spare. I don't know how well it's going to hold up, since 1 band already broke. I don't know if I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: My son is a thrilled customer
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old carries this thing around like Dennis the Menace. He LOVES this slingshot. Great quality, built solid-this thing has held up to his love!
customer_reviews.author: Aja O

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the slingshot it can use up to 3 bands so packs a kick. Better to get a long draw with less bands then a short draw with 3 so testing the different amounts of bands could help people not use to as high of resistance. I thing 3 bands works well for me accurate and foldable. I gave everything a tightening up when I got it the only thing that is lose is the wrist brace but with the resistance it shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Malloch

customer_reviews.title: Just more made in China garbage
customer_reviews.text: just more made in China garbage, it came out of the pre opened box dirty and used with no instructions, loose handle brackets unable to tighten, handle was way to small and uncomfortable for my hand (I'm only 5'8").... my wish list is that Amazon would post the country of origin on every product they, this would make it easier to support "Made in The USA" products as well as weed out really good counterfeit products.... 99% of my send backs are always made in China. Getting pretty tired of that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.LeGarreta

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! It seems that they don’t even care. The top metal piece is loose and can not be tightened with the screw. There is one screw missing for holding the wrist band. There come a few small plastic pieces need to be assembled but there is no instruction at all. And I get no idea how to put them together. The whole piece feels heavy but not a sturdy one. The factory either had no quality check or they simply sent me a used/returned one. Definitely not for anyone serious about this. Better to buy a $9 slingshot from Big5.
customer_reviews.author: Tingting

customer_reviews.title: If tightening screw on light mount doesnt fit in place, switch sides.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and seems like it will last. I did have problem with flashlight mount, because there wasn't room for tightening screw. I switched sides and it works fine. Strong magnets on back of wrist support holds lots of ammo too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Christman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome slingshot, sturdy and good build. Love the design. And the seller provides awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MrMeMoUpT

customer_reviews.title: It assembles so easily, I questioned if I was doing it right
customer_reviews.text: It assembles so easily, I questioned if I was doing it right. The Vendor sent pictures of it completely assembled which helped. Excellent product and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: The screw through the bracket that holds the folding forearm support pulled the threads out of the cast aluminum handle on the FRIST pull back of the sling. Further inspection revealed the hole was too large for the screw resulting in less than ideal thread engagement. Additionally, the angle of the forearm support from the aforementioned bracket to the stops is incorrect as well causing more stress than necessary when extended and pressure applied during sling pull back. Long story short, poorly designed junk.
customer_reviews.author: Avg Joe

customer_reviews.title: A very good and easy to use slingshot
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it can! I live how durable and solid this slingshot is! Although.. if you have big fingers like me I suggest you buy some 1/2” steel balls to shoot because the small ones are hard to grab with my sausage fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of pinch strength to pull back
customer_reviews.text: I've had other slingshots that usually have 2 bands on both sides or a single band. This one has 3 bands and I'm having trouble pulling it back to my eye so i can line up a shot. Its otherwise I'm too weak or the pounds it takes to pull back is insane. I can't get a accurate shot ╮(‵▽′)╭
customer_reviews.author: Rober P

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, not super well made
customer_reviews.text: It’s 30 years too long since I’ve had one. Good stuff for the price. Nuts that hold brace on need some locktite or some such. Downgraded. Parts aren’t well made and get loose quickly. Light mount just doesn’t fit right. Fine for price but you aren’t getting quality fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot seems to be constructed will. I have not shot it yet, so I can not speak for the accuracy. The problem I have and the reason it received 2 stars is because I did not receive everything as advertised. After opening the box I noticed that I was missing: 1of 2 powerful rubber band 100 hunting steel ammo 3 screw keys 1 flashlight shelf It seems like there is a problem with quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks a lot cooler than a daisy!
customer_reviews.text: This works about the same as a daisy except three things. It looks way cooler. It has better sites for accuracy. The daisy has more power. If we could get better rubber bands this thing would be next level. I’m gonna search for better bands.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for target practice or when the Zombies finally start coming to eat your brains.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for target practice or when the Zombies finally start coming to eat your brains. Since it is quite and can use clay or metal ammo of varioys sizes, even random rocks, it will be perfect for your stealth Zombie kills.
customer_reviews.author: The Reaper DRR  TM

customer_reviews.title: Literally worst sling ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: I own multiple wrist rockets and this is the worst I've ever tried. The wrist brace is unusable and it catches on the sides of the grip and jams your hand down so you can't grip it. The bands are garbage. That should be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffus T. Murdock

customer_reviews.title: How to order replacement slingshot bands  for the slingshot?
customer_reviews.text: I love the sling shot. I had a couple of the strings break after using it not long after I bought it. I was using the 1/2 steel balls that I had ordered when I received the slingshot. The sling shot is awesome. I think I should be using slightly lighter or smaller ammo is the only thing I could think might have made a difference. How can I order replacement strings for the slingshot to get the slingshot back in operation?
customer_reviews.author: David M Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Very strong , perfect for someone with experience. The reason i only give one star it's because they sent me a useed one and i payed for a new one . So if you're gonna buy one , make sure you get what you pay for. or buy it somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It’s a ok  slingshot
customer_reviews.text: It a ok slingshot it shoots about the same as my wrist rocket type slingshots. but the rubber tubes are tiny with that being said it shoots fine and the magnet on the wrist brace are real nice It’s kind on the heavy side but it’s an OK slingshot
customer_reviews.author: Vern Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: I survived the quarantine by becoming an expert marksman with this slingshot. It will punch through quarter inch plywood at 20 feet with the right ammunition, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Very nice slingshot with a GOOD amount of power, the only con is the magnets are very weak. 5-Star overall!
customer_reviews.author: RICHIEE 🇳🇮

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!!!! BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with the 5 bands in the picture. Extremely upset and my son is very disappointed as he bought it with his own money and can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy another for our other son (9) and he loves it too. It is made of high quality and is very sturdy. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KrisE

customer_reviews.title: Fell
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after about 10 uses. Was fun while it lasted tho
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Good slingshot, except the head keeps coming loose .It has a good grip and I believe shoots well, with someone who can use it correctly .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Not a cheap toy. Stronger than the single tube slingshot. I thought the magnet on the wrist was a cheesy gimmick but it's actually pretty handy.
customer_reviews.author: masterbates

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: The recesses where the band's attach were not bored out thoroughly, had to go in and finish opening the hole. Once that was done it was great. Decent accuracy which is due more to front facing systems error than the sling shot. (Aka my lack of experience) other than that nice wrist rocket.
customer_reviews.author: Killian

customer_reviews.title: Needs bigger projectiles
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty cool slingshot but needs to come with bigger balls the little ones wouldn't make it through a cardboard box
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This slingshot is a ton of fun. The magnetic leather is awesome cause you can hold your ammo right on your wrist, vs having to carry it in your pocket. I can't figure out what all the L wrenches and the flashlight holder piece is for, but whatever, it shoots and that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kautz

customer_reviews.title: good starter
customer_reviews.text: for the money very good learning slingshot. I give it 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jim Thienel

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: The tension in the rubber-bands is truly strong as advertised , this Sling-shot is well worth the money ( $20.99 ) , I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Precision - Analysis

customer_reviews.title: Lethal
customer_reviews.text: Rats won't stand a chance under forty yards. It is as accurate as you are. And it's definitely not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: it is beautiful and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this slingshot. It's so much fun to play with. It's powerful enough to scare off critters.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wall

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: its fine, but not strong enough to hunt. It barely dents a coke can at 15 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sling shot.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, hefty. I would like to see a larger pouch on this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kishell

customer_reviews.title: It’s meh...
customer_reviews.text: It’s meh. Not necessarily bad, but I wouldn’t call it great by any means.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just fun! It's spot on, strong as heck just very fun all around!
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It looks great looks and looks like it would shoot great 1st week it arrived strap already broke doesn't shoot powerful at all better off buying a cheap 1
customer_reviews.author: Caparrett2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This singshot is sturdy and accuracy. It is described as advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: No power in the skinny bands
customer_reviews.text: Save your money.This product is well made and has a nice weight and balance to it. My only complaint is the bands are smaller than they appear and have no power to them. I guess this would be great for a beginner at 15 yards or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Wooley 1

customer_reviews.title: Great Sling Shot !!!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin has been on a Prepper kick in case SHTF and she talked me into collecting items for survival myself. This Sling Shot is easy to use and is light weight. I recommend that you give this a shot ♥
customer_reviews.author: Dawne Elaine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and the bands are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The bands only stretch 6 inches max and the thing is overly heavy. It feels cheap and I would recommend saving yourself money and buying a BB gun.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great little slingshot.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy duty set up. I do wish it had a little more power.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bands are too tight to be accurate
customer_reviews.text: It is way too stiff to be accurate. Range is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly decent quality, though the bands are not great
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times and two of the bands seem to be splitting already. otherwise, seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: geethanks

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty impressive.. actually impresses the people have showed it to.
customer_reviews.text: It's me that needs to learn how to aim..🤣 The slingshot has no problem working
customer_reviews.author: David Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works great. Not exactly for someone with large hands but it works . My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The sling shot is great but the extra green rubber tubing was missing a piece that allows it to lock into place.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hall

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, and a great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: S. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Quality is here in the hands
customer_reviews.text: I have never layed hand on a slingshot quite like this one. Sturdy and sure in feel. My first experience in shooting was enjoyable. Easily a winner. I can rely on the device
customer_reviews.author: VAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the man Who has Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JScaar

customer_reviews.title: Super slingshot
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes that he has a "site" with which to aim. He hits his target 90% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: medicbev

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, make sure to tighten all bolts but don't strip them
customer_reviews.text: Broke before even being able to use. Tried to repair but completely unsafe
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne C Shults

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice that it has an extra set of
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It’s nice that it has an extra set of bands
customer_reviews.author: Shetlander B

customer_reviews.title: came in good condition,
customer_reviews.text: Item came in good condition, Only ammo balls were missing from order so 1 star lost for 1 missing item.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Has a really nice lime green and black coloring 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome has 2 Circular magnets on the forearm rest for the sling shot ammo. Shots well.
customer_reviews.author: jose diaz

customer_reviews.title: Go outside
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves this and it actually gets him to go outside without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: No directions,  unassembled
customer_reviews.text: The slingshot came with 0 directions and was totally disassembled......i had to pull up a picture to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: darrin gargus

customer_reviews.title: Fun and accurate! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, just because, he loved it!! We kayak alot so this little gem will come in handy when we're riverside camping!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wrist rocket
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic wrist rocket! Works just as expected i can't find one local of this good qaulity . It is my first time owning one since I was a teenager 15 years ago and this one is just great very easy to handle my 6 year old daughter can get a good shot out of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: KEEP IT REAL ✌

customer_reviews.title: Broken on the first use
customer_reviews.text: Resistance band snaps on the first use, barely use for a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Mitz.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun. Not greatest accuracy so you have to shoot at bigger targets.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Serves it’s purpose well. Easy to assemble and use. Getting better with practice,
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: The Allen screw that holds the wrist support to the sling shot does not stay tight. Too short of thread. One rubber band nicked a hole putting it on. Sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.author: Stoneman47

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this slingshot. Exactly what I expected. The only downside is that the bands need to be replaced with new ones for proper draw length.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Garcia

customer_reviews.title: To much fun
customer_reviews.text: It sits well in the hand and the fore arm brace is placed well to fit. It has a powerful stretch to the bands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: Oops, I goofed
customer_reviews.text: Originally I thought I was missing the spare bands as depicted but reexamining the shipment I was wrong, everything is present. I am sorry for my error!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with the slingshot and ammo but no bands. Does not work without the rubber bands!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Corley

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This sling shot is durable, accurate, and fun.. I've had it for over a month.. Its worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Krayzee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Bands too tight. Construction not the best. Works ok. Gave it away!!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Tautfest

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Tough good stretch only problem is the forearm stabilizer is made for smaller people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its really durable
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in hand And I like how it comes with an extra sling
customer_reviews.author: zakkery

customer_reviews.title: Order incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Order was to come with 100 shot balls ,only received 50. Unexceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Just be LESS shorter than 6' tall
customer_reviews.text: Great, Just be LESS shorter than 6' tall. The bands for me a 6'4" tall man and long armed, I over powered the bands quickly. Also buy way more ammo....the new rule is it take 7 hours practice to be sort of perfect . Good luck. (They make a 15" band somewhere)
customer_reviews.author: YounSwis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design, the wrist bracket does not lay flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design , the wrist bracket does not lay flat against your forearm when shooting , on one shot along hit wrist bracket, accuracy is dismal
customer_reviews.author: gil54

product_meta.title: NOBONDO Strong Folding Wrist Rocket Slingshot - Heavy Duty Adjustable Stainless Steel Wrist Brace Hunting Catapult with 2 Rubber Bands and 100 Ammo Balls
product_meta.description:
You can learn how to precise shooting - all it takes is some education, some practice, and voila! 

This powerful hunting slingshot is enough strong to hunt rabbit，rat，bird and any small and medium prey.

Package Include：

Slingshot ×1

Powerful rubber bands ×2

Hunting steel ammo ×100

Screw Key ×3

Flashlight shelf ×1

Material：

aluminum alloy slingshot

stainless steel wrist brace

triple strength powerful rubber bands

warning：Do not shoot at people, it is dangerous! Please in length 300 meters*300 meters empty spaces use.

The products for illegal activities is prohibited.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL: hunting slingshot with triple Strength rubber bands and ergonomic molded adjustable handle grip feels powerful and comfort in your hand
PRECISE SHOOTING: adjustable wrist brace and golden proportions slingshot makes you precision hunting, this slingshot also good for a beginner
HEAVY DUTY: all metal material slingshot with durable rubber powerful bands is great for field adventures and hunting the rabbit
PROFESSIONAL HUNTING TOOL: high velocity, accurate and powerful. magnetic leather makes you can replenish bullets quickly
ADEQUATE ACCESSORIES:100 ammo balls enough to outdoor hunting, one more reserve powerful rubber bands include, can easy replace

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
